Saudi Arabia is a key counterweight to Iran, and as recent attacks on Saudi oil fields show, instability in the region ripples out to potentially disturb global peace and endanger American lives. Saudi Arabia is a valued security partner ‚Äì but not one we will support at any cost.

Last week, @SenToddYoung and I visited Saudi Arabia and met with Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman. During our conversation, we made it clear that public actions ‚Äì not private assurances ‚Äì will repair the US/Saudi relationship.
